parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake chamber can cause the brake assembly to break off the axle, leading to a loss of braking power, which can result in accidents, injuries, or fatalities, especially when carrying heavy loads.
symptoms: Brake chamber falls off the axle
brake chamber cracks
brake chamber mounting plate breaks
brake chamber mounts crack
brake chamber cover breaks
brake assembly breaks off axle
failure to stop vehicle in safe stopping distance.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Frame Rail Corrosion and Structural Integrity
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The corrosion of the frame rails can compromise the structural integrity of the vehicle, posing a significant risk to the safety of the driver and other road users. If the frame rails fail, the vehicle can become uncontrollable, leading to accidents or loss of life.
symptoms: Rusting or corrosion of the frame rails
weakening of the frame structure
potential loss of control or separation of the frame components while driving.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Left Front Drive Axle Brake Chamber Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the left front drive axle brake chamber can cause a loss of braking power, leading to extended stopping distances, increased risk of accidents, and potential loss of control.
symptoms: The brake chamber is broken off and hanging by hoses
studs are broken out of the base
unusual noises or vibrations when applying the brakes
spongy or soft brake pedal
reduced braking power.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake chamber studs can cause the brake chamber to break off, leading to a loss of braking power, extended stopping distances, and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: The brake chamber is broken off and hanging by hoses
studs are broken out of the base
unusual noises or vibrations when applying the brakes
spongy or soft brake pedal
reduced braking power.
